00001 #include "TilePanel.h"
00002 
00003 #define TILE_MAX 5
00004 
00005 static wxPen pens[5] = {*wxTRANSPARENT_PEN, wxPen(wxColour(0, 0, 255)), wxPen(wxColour(255, 255, 0)), *wxRED_PEN, *wxGREEN_PEN};
00006 static wxBrush brushes[5] = {*wxTRANSPARENT_BRUSH, *wxBLUE_BRUSH, wxBrush(wxColour(255, 255, 0)), *wxRED_BRUSH, *wxGREEN_BRUSH};
00007 
00008 static wxPen invalidPen = wxPen(wxColour(192, 192, 192));
00009 static wxBrush invalidBrush = wxBrush(wxColour(192, 192, 192));
00010 
00011 TilePanel::TilePanel(BlokusTile *tile, u8 team, wxWindow *parent, wxWindowID id, const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& size)
00012 :wxPanel(parent, id, pos, size, wxTAB_TRAVERSAL | wxFULL_REPAINT_ON_RESIZE)
00013 {
00014       SetOwnBackgroundColour(*wxWHITE);
00015       Show(true);
00016 
00017       DisplayTile = tile;
00018       Team = team;
00019 }
00020 
00021 void TilePanel::OnPaint(wxPaintEvent& event)
00022 {
00023       wxPaintDC dc(this);
00024       int width, height;
00025 
00026       GetClientSize(&width, &height);
00027 
00028       if(DisplayTile->getAmount() > 0)
00029       {
00030             dc.SetPen(pens[Team]);
00031             dc.SetBrush(brushes[Team]);
00032       }
00033       
00034       else
00035       {
00036             dc.SetPen(invalidPen);
00037             dc.SetBrush(invalidBrush);
00038       }
00039 
00040       for(unsigned int i = 0; i < DisplayTile->getTileData()->Width; ++i)
00041       {
00042             for(unsigned int j = 0; j < DisplayTile->getTileData()->Height; ++j)
00043             {
00044                   Block b = DisplayTile->getTileData()->Blocks[j*DisplayTile->getTileData()->Width + i];
00045                   if(b == BLOCK_EMPTY)
00046                         continue;
00047 
00048                   /*dc.DrawRectangle(i*width/DisplayTile->Width, j*height/DisplayTile->Height,
00049                   (i+1)*width/DisplayTile->Width-i*width/DisplayTile->Width,
00050                   (j+1)*height/DisplayTile->Height-j*height/DisplayTile->Height);*/
00051 
00052                   dc.DrawRectangle(i*width/TILE_MAX, j*height/TILE_MAX,
00053                   (i+1)*width/TILE_MAX-i*width/TILE_MAX,
00054                   (j+1)*height/TILE_MAX-j*height/TILE_MAX);
00055             }
00056       }
00057 
00058       // Draw lines
00059       dc.SetPen(*wxWHITE_PEN);
00060       dc.SetBrush(*wxWHITE_BRUSH);
00061 
00062       for(unsigned int i = 1; i < DisplayTile->getTileData()->Width; ++i)
00063       {
00064             //dc.DrawLine(i*width/DisplayTile->Width, 0, i*width/DisplayTile->Width, height);
00065             dc.DrawLine(i*width/TILE_MAX, 0, i*width/TILE_MAX, height);
00066       }
00067 
00068       for(unsigned int i = 1; i < DisplayTile->getTileData()->Height; ++i)
00069       {
00070             dc.DrawLine(0, i*height/TILE_MAX, width, i*height/TILE_MAX);
00071       }
00072 }
00073 
00074 BEGIN_EVENT_TABLE(TilePanel, wxPanel)
00075     EVT_PAINT(TilePanel::OnPaint)
00076 END_EVENT_TABLE()
